text: Yegor Timurovich Gaidar (; 19 March 1956 – 16 December 2009) was a Soviet and Russian economist, politician, and author. He was the Acting Prime Minister of Russia from 15 June 1992 to 14 December 1992. ==References== ==Other websites== * Yegor Gaidar's home page * Gaidar, acting Russian PM under Yeltsin, dies * Yegor Gaidar – Daily Telegraph obituary Category:1956 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Russia Category:Politicians from Moscow
title: Yegor Gaidar
